name: Security Man
desc: This man is tall and strong. He is looking at you with his fist clenched. He will rush up to you at any moment.

name: Stranger
desc: This man is tall and strong. He is looking at you with his fist clenched. He will rush up to you at any moment.

name: Doll
desc: This doll leans against a wall. Its eyes seem staring at you which makes you feel violated. You want to give it a good beat!
